name: docpad-plugin-uglify
description: Adds support for uglify-js's parser/compressor to DocPad
readme:
# UglifyJS Plugin for DocPad Adds support for [UglifyJS](https://github.com/mishoo/UglifyJS) 's parser/compressor to [DocPad](https://github.com/bevry/docpad) ## Install ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-uglify ``` ## History You can discover the history inside the `History.md` file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
Copyright © 2012 [Takeharu.Oshida](http://georgeosddev.github.com)
